data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Quoting the README:

    Math::Symbolic is intended to offer symbolic calculation
    capabilities to the Perl programmer without using external (and
    commercial) libraries and/or applications. [...] Partial derivatives
    of logarithms, exponentiations, and arithmetic terms (*,/,+,- and
    unary minus as well as variables and constants) work rather well
    albeit slowly). Simplification of algebraic terms is severely
    limited at this time. [...]

    I think the module should be on the list because I have yet to find
    a related module in there. I plan to continue developing the module
    and upgrade its status from "pre-alpha" to "Released" at some point.
    In the meantime, I'd love to get some feedback from users and
    hackers alike which being included in the module list would help
    with.
